sentences.en: A routine scan revealed abnormalities in the fetus.
sentences.cn: 一次常规扫描发现胎儿畸形。

sentences.en: An ultrasound scan can detect abnormality in a fetus.
sentences.cn: 超声波扫描能够检测出胎儿是否畸形.

sentences.en: Embryology: Study of the formation and development of an embryo and fetus.
sentences.cn: 胚胎学: 研究胚胎和胎儿的形成和发育的学科.

sentences.en: Growing research suggests that odd food yearnings - food aversions - may protect the fetus.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的研究表明对奇怪食物的偏好 -- 和厌恶 -- 可能是出于保护胎儿的缘故.

sentences.en: In the fetus, blood cells are formed in different sites at different ages.
sentences.cn: 胎儿的血细胞在不同时期生成在不同的部位.

sentences.en: In which organ of the human female does the fetus develope?
sentences.cn: 人类女性中哪个器官是胎儿发育的地方?

sentences.en: Is a fetus that has not yet quickened alive or not?
sentences.cn: 尚未胎动的胎儿是活的抑或不然?

sentences.en: Microscopic examination of a cell's chromo-somes can reveal the sex of the fetus.
sentences.cn: 利用显微镜检查细胞染色体可以发现胎儿的性别。

sentences.en: Miscarriages are usually caused by abnormal chromosome patterns in the fetus.
sentences.cn: 流产通常是因为胎儿的染色体异常造成的.

sentences.en: Modern medical technology like type-B ultrasonic checks can reveal the fetus gender.
sentences.cn: 现在的医疗仪器例如B超是可以分辨出胎儿的性别的。

sentences.en: Necropsy of the fetus reveals autolysis which is nonspecific.
sentences.cn: 胎儿尸检显示非特异性自溶现象.

sentences.en: Objective: To discuss the relationship between hydramnios and fetus anomaly.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的: 探讨羊水过多与胎儿畸形的关系.

sentences.en: Pregnant women who are heavy drinkers risk damaging the unborn fetus.
sentences.cn: 孕妇酗酒可能会危及腹中胎儿。

sentences.en: Surely the fetus has a right to life?
The duration of pregnancy may be influenced by the endocrine functions of the fetus.
sentences.cn: 胎儿的内分泌机能亦可影响妊娠期.

trans.tran_en: A fetus is an animal or human being in its later stages of development before it is born
